message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a fair deal for the first round.
Let's split it 55/45, it's a better deal than your 60/40!
I understand you want a larger share, but my offer is the most fair we can get. Let's not lose any more money to inflation.
Come on, just a little bit more. We're both losing money here.
This is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it down the middle and call it a day.  Any more rounds and we'll both be losing significant amounts.
